edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.common
Class LSPBooleanOp

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.common.LSPObject
        |
        +--edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.common.LSPBooleanOp
public class LSPBooleanOp
extends LSPObject

Represents a "boolean-op" as defined in the STARTS 1.0 specification. Boolean operators are used inside of rankings (LSPRanking) and filters (LSPFilter).

A boolean operator can be one of three types:

  • AND
  • OR
  • AND_NOT
It can either be instaniate by the type code, or by name ("and", "or", "and-not").
